price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Medeε me Wura Nyankopͻn na mesu frε no, na menfa biribi mmata ne ho “.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
